column3: News;Kampong Speu: A Chinese man using a motorized water pump was electrocuted and killed instantly. The incident occured October 19
column5: an metal factory in Saishan village. Preah Nousar Commune
column7: Kampong Speu Province.------Witnesses said that before the incident
column8: they saw a Chinese man named Li Chi Minh (although there is no clear identification document) a 35 year old man living on site
column9: pulling a 50m long cable with a motor pump.------ After he died suddenly
column10: the police came down to inspect the scene and concluded he had been killed by an electric shock.------Warning
column12: this is the second Chinese worker to die in this area in the past few days. The other was also electrocuted.------https://cne.wtf/2018/10/17/chinese-worker-electrocuted-in-kampong-spue/
